description: Add tags to an accelerator resource. For more information, see Tagging in Global Accelerator in the Global Accelerator Developer Guide.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Global Accelerator resource to add tags to. An ARN uniquely identifies a resource.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to add to a resource. A tag consists of a key and a value that you define. (dict) --- A complex type that contains a Tag key and Tag value. A string that contains a Tag key. A string that contains a Tag value.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A string that contains a Tag key.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A string that contains a Tag value.
